snippet: Intelligence officials believe Iran was the origin of network attacks that crippled computers across the Saudi oil industry and breached American financial institutions.
abstract: Intelligence officials believe Iran was the origin of network attacks that crippled computers across the Saudi oil industry and breached American financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: Intelligence officials believe Iran was the origin of network attacks that crippled computers across the Saudi oil industry and breached American financial institutions, report Thom Shanker and David E. Sanger. Read more »

headline.main: U.S. Suspects Iranians Were Behind a Wave of Cyberattacks
